title: Wishlist Product Added Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.wishlist_product_added event. Fired when a user adds a product to a wishlist or favorites list.

product.description: The product that was added to the wishlist.

wishlistId.description: The unique identifier of the wishlist.

wishlistName.description: The human-readable name of the wishlist (e.g. 'My Favorites', 'Gift Ideas').
